description.text: Generates a linear weighted fit for a set of data.

table.name: Y Fitted
table.descr: The array of fitted Y values.

table.name: Y Lo
table.descr: The array of +1 sigma fitted values.

table.name: Y Hi
table.descr: The array of -1 sigma fitted values.

table.name: Residuals
table.descr: The residuals of the fitted data.

float.name: a
float.descr: The a value in the fit to y = a + b*x.

float.name: b
float.descr: The b value in the fit to y = a + b*x.

float.name: cov00
float.descr: The 0,0 value of the covariance matrix.

float.name: cov01
float.descr: The 0,1 value of the covariance matrix.

float.name: cov11
float.descr: The 1,1 value of the covariance matrix.

float.name: sumsq
float.descr: The sum of squares of the residuals.
